# b3gbi

Analyze biodiversity trends and spatial patterns from GBIF data cubes,
using flexible indicators like richness, evenness, and more.

## Overview

Biodiversity researchers need robust and standardized tools to analyze
the vast amounts of data available on platforms like GBIF. The b3gbi
package leverages the power of data cubes to streamline biodiversity
assessments. It helps researchers gain insights into:

- **Changes Over Time:** How biodiversity metrics shift throughout the
  years.
- **Spatial Variations:** Differences in biodiversity across regions,
  identifying hotspots or areas of concern.
- **The Impact of Factors:** How different environmental variables or
  human activities might affect biodiversity patterns.

## Key Features

b3gbi empowers biodiversity analysis with:

- **Standardized Workflows:** Simplify the process of calculating common
  biodiversity indicators from GBIF data cubes.
- **Flexibility:** Calculate richness, evenness, rarity, taxonomic
  distinctness, Shannon-Hill diversity, Simpson-Hill diversity, and
  more.
- **Analysis Options:** Explore temporal trends or create spatial maps.
- **Visualization Tools:** Generate publication-ready plots of your
  biodiversity metrics.

## Installation

Install **b3gbi** in R:

``` r
install.packages("b3gbi", repos = c("https://b-cubed-eu.r-universe.dev", "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
```

## Example: Three-Step Workflow

This basic example demonstrates the core workflow: preparing the data
cube, calculating an indicator, and plotting the result as a spatial map
of species richness for mammals in Denmark.

``` r
# Load package
library(b3gbi)

# 1. Load and prepare the GBIF data cube
cube_name <- system.file("extdata", "denmark_mammals_cube_eqdgc.csv", package = "b3gbi")
mammal_data <- process_cube(cube_name)

# 2. Calculate a map of observed richness
map_obs_rich_mammals <- obs_richness_map(mammal_data, level = "country", region = "Denmark", ne_scale = "medium")

# 3. Plot the indicator map
plot(map_obs_rich_mammals, title = "Observed Species Richness: Mammals in Denmark")
```

![](reference/figures/README-example-1.png)

For a more in-depth introduction, see the tutorial:
<https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/articles/b3gbi.html>.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`area_rarity_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/area_rarity_map.md)
  [`area_rarity_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/area_rarity_map.md)
  [`ab_rarity_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/area_rarity_map.md)
  [`ab_rarity_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/area_rarity_map.md)
  : Calculate Rarity Over Time or Space

- [`available_indicators`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/available_indicators.md)
  : Indicators Available for Use in the Package

- [`calc_ci()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/calc_ci.md)
  : Calculate Confidence Intervals for a Biodiversity Indicator

- [`calc_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/calc_map.md)
  : Calculate Biodiversity Indicators Over Space

- [`calc_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/calc_ts.md)
  : Calculate Biodiversity Indicators Over Time

- [`check_crs_units()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/check_crs_units.md)
  : Check if a given CRS is in meters or degrees.

- [`compute_indicator_workflow()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/compute_indicator_workflow.md)
  : Calculate Biodiversity Indicators Over Space or Time

- [`convert_eqdgc_latlong()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/convert_eqdgc_latlong.md)
  : Convert equal-area quarter-degree grid cell codes to latitude and
  longitude

- [`create_sf_from_utm()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/create_sf_from_utm.md)
  : Create an sf object from UTM coordinates, handling multiple zones
  correctly.

- [`cum_richness_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/cum_richness_ts.md)
  : Calculate Cumulative Species Richness

- [`example_cube_1`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/example_cube_1.md)
  : Cube of GBIF Mammal Occurrences in Denmark

- [`example_indicator_map1`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/example_indicator_map1.md)
  : Map of Observed Species Richness for Mammals in Denmark

- [`example_indicator_ts1`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/example_indicator_ts1.md)
  : Time Series of Observed Species Richness for Mammals in Denmark

- [`example_indicator_ts2`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/example_indicator_ts2.md)
  : Time Series of Cumulative Species Richness for Insects in Europe

- [`get_bootstrap_ci()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/get_bootstrap_ci.md)
  :

  Calculate confidence intervals for list of `boot` objects

- [`get_observed_years()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/get_observed_years.md)
  : Extract Years With Observations from an Indicator Map

- [`hill0_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/hill0_map.md)
  [`hill0_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/hill0_map.md)
  [`hill1_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/hill0_map.md)
  [`hill1_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/hill0_map.md)
  [`hill2_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/hill0_map.md)
  [`hill2_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/hill0_map.md)
  : Calculate Estimated Hill Diversity Over Space or Time

- [`list_species()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/list_species.md)
  : Extract Species Names.

- [`mgrs_to_latlong_bbox()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/mgrs_to_latlong_bbox.md)
  : Create a Single Bounding Box from MGRS Data in a Projected CRS

- [`newness_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/newness_map.md)
  [`newness_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/newness_map.md)
  : Calculate Mean Year of Occurrence Over Time or Space

- [`obs_richness_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/obs_richness_map.md)
  [`obs_richness_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/obs_richness_map.md)
  : Calculate Observed Species Richness Over Space or Time

- [`occ_density_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/occ_density_map.md)
  [`occ_density_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/occ_density_map.md)
  : Calculate Occurrence Density Over Space or Time

- [`occ_turnover_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/occ_turnover_ts.md)
  : Calculate Occupancy Turnover

- [`pielou_evenness_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/pielou_evenness_map.md)
  [`pielou_evenness_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/pielou_evenness_map.md)
  [`williams_evenness_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/pielou_evenness_map.md)
  [`williams_evenness_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/pielou_evenness_map.md)
  : Calculate Evenness Over Time or Space

- [`plot_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/plot_map.md)
  : Plot Biodiversity Indicator Map

- [`plot_mv()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/plot_mv.md)
  : Plot Interactive Biodiversity Indicator Map

- [`plot_species_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/plot_species_map.md)
  : Plot Occurrence Map or Range Map of Individual Species

- [`plot_species_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/plot_species_ts.md)
  : Plot Occurrence Trends or Range Size Trends for Individual Species

- [`plot_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/plot_ts.md)
  : Plot Biodiversity Indicator Trend

- [`print(`*`<available_indicators>`*`)`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/print.available_indicators.md)
  : Print Available Indicators

- [`print(`*`<indicator_map>`*`)`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/print.indicator_map.md)
  : Print an Indicator Map Object

- [`print(`*`<indicator_ts>`*`)`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/print.indicator_ts.md)
  : Print an Indicator Time Series Object

- [`print(`*`<processed_cube>`*`)`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/print.processed_cube.md)
  : Print a Processed Data Cube Object

- [`print(`*`<processed_cube_dsinfo>`*`)`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/print.processed_cube_dsinfo.md)
  : Print a Processed Data Cube Object

- [`print(`*`<sim_cube>`*`)`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/print.sim_cube.md)
  : Print a Simulated Data Cube Object

- [`process_cube()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/process_cube.md)
  : Process GBIF Data Cubes

- [`spec_occ_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/spec_occ_map.md)
  [`spec_occ_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/spec_occ_map.md)
  : Calculate Species Occurrences Over Space or Time

- [`spec_range_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/spec_range_map.md)
  [`spec_range_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/spec_range_map.md)
  : Plot Species Ranges Over Space or Time

- [`tax_distinct_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/tax_distinct_map.md)
  [`tax_distinct_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/tax_distinct_map.md)
  : Calculate Taxonomic Distinctness Over Space or Time

- [`total_occ_map()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/total_occ_map.md)
  [`total_occ_ts()`](https://b-cubed-eu.github.io/b3gbi/reference/total_occ_map.md)
  : Calculate Total Occurrences Over Space or Time
